name: Animal Quest (Alpha Version)
description:
Animal Quest - Forest Survival  (Alpha Version)

A wild nature  game where you can experience life through the eyes of your favorite animals. Try to catch your prey, while challenged by predators and other dangerous competitors. Publisher ALIVESOFT.COM

Animal Quest game play

Main Menu animal selection

Setting Options

Animal Food Chain

Animal Quest is a PC Windows game from Alivesoft, it will be available the fall of 2019. Meanwhile you can try this online demo to experience the Animal Quest game play. Please note that the web version is limited due to size requirements. Some of the Graphics, Sounds and Music are temporary and they will be changed in the final version. 

For the latest game visit us at ALIVESOFT.COM

Follow us on Facebook: @AnimalQuestGame

Subscribe to YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zaT00q-dZL8
